title: John Fitzgerald Kennedy National Historic Site: Guided Tours
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Guided Tours               Guided Tours         The Master Bedroom at 83 Beals St. where John F. Kennedy was born.   During the summer season, John Fitzgerald Kennedy National Historic Site offers guided tours Wednesdays through Sunday. Ranger-guided tours are available at 10:00, 10:30, 11:00, 11:30, 1:00, 1:30, 2:00, 2:30, 3:00, and 3:30.  Self-guided tours are available from 12:00-1:00 and 4:00-5:00. On some days, rangers also lead neighborhood walks at  2:15; please call 617-566-7937 for the schedule.       Cell Phone Tours When the site is closed, audio tours are accessible online or by dialing 617-992-9172, normal usage rates apply. These tours offer visitors the chance to hear about the home from either the perspective of the President's mother, Rose Kennedy, or a Park Ranger.         A ranger beckons visitors into 83 Beals. St. NPS
